entry.title: Developers vs. Enterprise
entry.summary:
Description

Speaker: Ingo Stegmaier

Track:PyConDE This 30-minute talk will give you an overview about project management, success factors and specialties within enterprises. This will be a guide how you promote internal projects and bring them to success within a highly "political" environment.

Recorded at the PyConDE & PyData Berlin 2019 conference. https://pycon.de

More details at the conference page: https://de.pycon.org/program/XJLSWG Twitter: https://twitter.com/pydataberlin Twitter: https://twitter.com/pyconde
